speech:
1.glass of  buttermilk,A pinch of salt,1 teaspoon of sugar A few drops of lemon juice mix well which helps for  Preventing dehydration Soothes the stomach and  Balances electrolytes in body                                                                            
                                                                         2    

Take fresh ash gourd, cut it into pieces, and grind well to extract the juice. Filter it and take 15 to 20 ml of the juice, adding a little sugar for taste. Consume this 3 to 4 times a day to keep the body hydrated and protect against heat waves.
